title: Bitcoin Hangs on Just Above $27K Ahead of Fed Rate Decision
description: The Fed on Wednesday is widely expected to hold rates steady, but investors will monitor new economic projections and Chairman Powell's press conference for clues about the direction of future policy.

title: Report: Hodlnaut’s Judicial Managers Oppose OPNX Takeover
description: According to a recent court filing, interim judicial managers for the troubled crypto lender Hodlnaut oppose a takeover by the crypto firm OPNX, which is linked to the now-defunct crypto hedge fund Three Arrows Capital and its founders. OPNX Takeover Faces Resistance from Hodlnaut’s Judicial Management On September 19, 2023, Bloomberg’s Suvashree Ghosh reported on […]

title: Top 5 Cryptocurrency Trends To Watch In Winter 2023
description: The cryptocurrency market is in a bear market, but there are still positive trends emerging. Here are a few of the top cryptocurrency trends to watch in winter 2023: The rise of Web3 and the metaverse Web3 is a new vision for the internet, one that is decentralized and owned by the users. title: Coinbase study: 55% of voters are likely to shun candidates opposing crypto
description: New research from Coinbase reveals that 55% of voters in pivotal U.S. states are less likely to support political candidates who oppose cryptocurrencies and web3 technologies. This data comes as part of Coinbase’s broader initiative to galvanize 52 million American…

title: Binance’s Bitcoin trading volume declined by 57% in September
description: Amid escalating regulatory scrutiny and legal challenges, Binance experienced a 57% drop in its weekly Bitcoin trading volume since the beginning of the month, signaling potential turbulence for the world’s largest cryptocurrency exchange. This downturn coincides with mounting legal challenges…

title: Hong Kong Official Calls For Crypto Regulation Amid JPEX Fiasco
description:
John Lee, the Chief Executive of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region (HKSAR), recently called for stricter crypto regulations following the ongoing issues with local crypto exchange JPEX. Lee’s comments came a day after the exchange suspended trading and withdrawals amid an investigation by the local police and regulators. According to a press release by […]
